TextBlock.Text: MENTH: Cumin, Sacco! Are you all right?
SACCO: Alright. What happens to us? The warp of this pod is failed, and we're crashed. Why?
CUMIN: We collided twice! It tipped at the beginning and fell straight down!
MENTH: There might be a connection between the pod's warp failure and our Vessel coming here. In any case, we have no choice but to go outside first.
